text:
Moscow opposes Hezbollah's position
02 Nov 2019, 01:04 by Lebanon 24
Some sources talk about Russia's intervention on the crisis line in Lebanon in terms of cooling the congestion and trying to find ways to satisfy the street and return things in Lebanon to a railway controlled by the political system of the country. The sources pointed out that "Moscow opposes the position taken by" Hezbollah ", both on the confrontation Russia fears that "the explosion of the situation in Lebanon, whether internally or related to tensions between Hezbollah and Israel, will adversely affect the efforts of Russian President Vladimir Putin." In creating infrastructure for a settlement that ends the war Observers in Moscow consider that "Russia has succeeded in launching the work of the Syrian Constitutional Committee, has also succeeded in concluding an agreement with Turkey on the safe area in northern Syria, and it is communicating with the United States and the European Union to agree on a road map sponsored by Western countries to support the political solution and launch And financing the reconstruction workshop. "
